extensionDescription.message: Identity Chooser helps you to choose the correct identity when composing a new email, replying to one or forwarding it.

options_icEnableComposeMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Write button

options_icEnableReplayMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Reply button

options_icEnableForwardMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Forward button

options_restart.hint.message: Hint: If you change any of these options you need to restart Thunderbird
